meanings.definition: A person who makes witty remarks or jokes.
meanings.sent1: The quipsters at the comedy club had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the best quipsters in town.
meanings.sent3: The quipsters at the party kept the mood light and fun.
meanings.sent4: His quick wit turned him into a quipster among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The quipsters' jokes were so clever, they became the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The act of making witty remarks or jokes.
meanings.sent1: The audience enjoyed the quipsters' performance on stage.
meanings.sent2: Quipsters often use humor to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent3: The quipsters' banter added a playful touch to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her quipster skills were on full display during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The quipsters' jokes were so witty, they left everyone in stitches.
